body.p: Born in Shelby County in 1811. Farmer. Married Julia Ann Booker and had six children. Children included William (died in infancy) Joseph W. Frances Cordelia, Thomas Lewis, Mattie Julia, and Cynthia Hudson. Died in 1887 in Shelby County
